header.title: SEO phpBB
header.description: Search engine friendly URLs with forum/topic - title in the URL
Suchmaschinenoptimierung durch statische Links mit dem Foren/Themen-Titel in der URL. Keine Session IDs mehr f체r G채ste
header.author-notes: For this Mod your Server need to support Apache module mod_rewrite
Damit man diesen Mod verwenden kann muss der Webserver mod_rewrite unterst체tzen.

edit.action:
RewriteEngine on #if your forum is in http://www.domain.tld/forum/ replace with RewriteBase /forum RewriteBase /
RewriteRule ^(.*)-f([0-9]*)/(.*)-t([0-9]*)-s([0-9]*).html viewtopic.php?f=$2&t=$4&start=$5&%{QUERY_STRING} [L] RewriteRule ^(.*)-f([0-9]*)/(.*)-t([0-9]*).html viewtopic.php?f=$2&t=$4&%{QUERY_STRING} [L] RewriteRule global/(.*)-t([0-9]*).html ./viewtopic.php?f=1&t=$2&%{QUERY_STRING} [L] RewriteRule ^(.*)-f([0-9]*)/index-s([0-9]*).html viewforum.php?f=$2&start=$3&%{QUERY_STRING} [L] RewriteRule ^(.*)-f([0-9]*)/ viewforum.php?f=$2&%{QUERY_STRING} [L] RewriteRule ^(.*)-f([0-9]*) viewforum.php?f=$2&%{QUERY_STRING} [L]
edit.comment: if your forum is in http://www.domain.tld/forum/ replace the RewriteBase with /forum/
Wenn dein Forum unter http://www.domain.tld/forum/ ersetze RewriteBase mit /forum/

edit.action: 'U_CANONICAL' => generate_board_url() . '/',
'U_CANONICAL' => generate_board_url() .'/' . title_to_url(censor_text($forum_data['forum_name'])) . '-f' . $forum_id . '/' . (($start) ? 'index-s' . $start . '.html' : ''),

$user->lang['TRANSLATION_INFO'] = 'Optimized by SEO phpBB
' . $user->lang['TRANSLATION_INFO'];
<a href="{U_SELF_URL}#review" onclick=
<a href="{U_SELF_URL}#postingbox"
<a href="{U_SELF_URL}#pr{topic_review_row.POST_ID}">
{L_BACK_TO_TOP}
{L_BACK_TO_TOP}
<base href="{U_BASE_URL}" /> <!-- IF U_CANONICAL --><link rel="canonical" href="{U_CANONICAL}" /><!-- ENDIF -->
<title>{PAGE_TITLE} • <!-- IF S_IN_MCP -->{L_MCP} • <!-- ELSEIF S_IN_UCP -->{L_UCP} • <!-- ENDIF -->{SITENAME}</title>
//document.location.href = base_url.replace(/&/g, '&') + '&start=' + ((page - 1) * per_page); document.location.href = base_url.replace(/&/g, '&') + '-s' + ((page - 1) * per_page + '.html');
{postrow.POST_SUBJECT}
{L_BACK_TO_TOP}
{faq_block.faq_row.FAQ_QUESTION}
{L_BACK_TO_TOP}
